mesquite.tol.lib

Class BaseHttpRequestMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.tol.lib.BaseHttpRequestMaker

  • public class BaseHttpRequestMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for http communication, built originally for TreeGrow
    Author:
    dmandel

        Execute a multipart post method to a tapestry page
        Parameters:
        prefix - The base url to open
        pageName - The name of the tapestry page
        stringArgs - Post arguments that have string keys and values
        fileArgs - Post arguments that have string keys and file values

      • makeHttpRequest

        public static java.lang.Object makeHttpRequest(java.lang.String url,
                                               org.apache.commons.httpclient.Credentials c,
                                               java.lang.String realm,
                                               boolean returnArray)
        Make the http request to the specified url
        Returns:
        If returnArray is true, a byte array containing the response bytes, if false, we return an ObjectArray with the first argument being an InputStream and the second being the GetMethod that was used to make the request. The GetMethod must have releaseConnection() called on it after all of the InputStream has been read.
